PROJECT(IRDumper)
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.8)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_OLD ${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS})
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_OLD} -fno-rtti -fpic")

FIND_PACKAGE(LLVM REQUIRED CONFIG)

include(CheckCXXCompilerFlag)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(${LLVM_DEFINITIONS})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${LLVM_INCLUDE_DIRS})

FILE(GLOB DUMPER_SRCS "dumper.cpp")
ADD_LIBRARY(IRDumper SHARED ${DUMPER_SRCS})

FILE(GLOB WRAPPER_SRCS "wrapper.cpp")
ADD_EXECUTABLE(ird-clang ${WRAPPER_SRCS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ird-clang IRDumper ${LLVM_AVAILABLE_LIBS})
ADD_EXECUTABLE(ird-clang++ ${WRAPPER_SRCS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ird-clang++ IRDumper ${LLVM_AVAILABLE_LIBS})

ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(clang ALL COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E create_symlink
  ${LLVM_TOOLS_BINARY_DIR}/clang ${IRDumper_BINARY_DIR}/clang) 
ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(clang++ ALL COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E create_symlink
  ${LLVM_TOOLS_BINARY_DIR}/clang++ ${IRDumper_BINARY_DIR}/clang++)
